member.name: P:CoinSystem.Properties.Resources.Commands
member.summary: 查詢類似 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <Root> <CommandInfo> <CommandCode>0</CommandCode> </CommandInfo> <CommandInfo> <CommandCode>1</CommandCode> <CommandName>Reset</CommandName> <Length>1</Length> </CommandInfo> <CommandInfo> <CommandCode>2</CommandCode> <CommandName>Set Channel Inhibits</CommandName> <Length>3</Length> </CommandInfo> <CommandInfo> <CommandCode>3</CommandCode> <CommandName>Display On</CommandName> <Length>1</Length> </Command [字串的其餘部分已遭截斷]"; 的當地語系化字串。

member.name: P:CoinSystem.Properties.Resources.GenericResponses
member.summary: 查詢類似 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <Root> <GenericResponseInfo> <GenericResponseCode>0</GenericResponseCode> </GenericResponseInfo> <GenericResponseInfo> <GenericResponseCode>1</GenericResponseCode> </GenericResponseInfo> <GenericResponseInfo> <GenericResponseCode>2</GenericResponseCode> </GenericResponseInfo> <GenericResponseInfo> <GenericResponseCode>3</GenericResponseCode> </GenericResponseInfo> <GenericResponseInfo> <GenericResponseCode>4</GenericRe [字串的其餘部分已遭截斷]"; 的當地語系化字串。

member.name: P:CoinSystem.Properties.Resources.PollResponses
member.summary: 查詢類似 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <Root> <PollResponseInfo> <PollResponseCode>0</PollResponseCode> </PollResponseInfo> <PollResponseInfo> <PollResponseCode>1</PollResponseCode> </PollResponseInfo> <PollResponseInfo> <PollResponseCode>2</PollResponseCode> </PollResponseInfo> <PollResponseInfo> <PollResponseCode>3</PollResponseCode> </PollResponseInfo> <PollResponseInfo> <PollResponseCode>4</PollResponseCode> </PollResponseInfo> <PollResponseInfo> [字串的其餘部分已遭截斷]"; 的當地語系化字串。
